TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示 Windows 列表视图控件，该控件显示可用四种不同视图之一显示的项集合。

span.span: Represents a Windows list view control, which displays a collection of items that can be displayed using one of four different views.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个控件可用于显示项文本和图标来标识项的类型 （可选） 使用的项的列表。A control allows you to display a list of items with item text and, optionally, an icon to identify the type of item. 例如，Windows 资源管理器中的文件列表是在外观上与类似控件。For example, the Windows Explorer list of files is similar in appearance to a control. 它显示的文件和文件夹树中当前选定的列表。It displays a list of the files and folders currently selected in the tree. 每个文件和文件夹显示以帮助识别文件或文件夹的类型与其关联的图标。Each file and folder displays an icon associated with it to help identify the type of file or folder. 类表示中的项控件。The class represents an item within a control. 可以使用五个不同的视图之一显示列表中显示的项。The items that are displayed in the list can be shown in one of five different views. 项可以显示为大图标、 小图标，或垂直列表中的小图标。Items can be displayed as large icons, as small icons, or as small icons in a vertical list. 项还具有子项，其中包含与父项相关的信息。Items can also have subitems which contain information that is related to the parent item. 详细信息视图，可标识要显示在子项中的信息的列标题与网格中显示该项及其子项。The details view allows you to display the item and its subitems in a grid with column headers that identify the information being displayed in a subitem. 磁贴视图中，有一定的限制如下所述，可以显示为包含大型图标旁边的文本信息的磁贴的项及其子项。The tile view, which has limited availability as described below, allows you to display the item and its subitems as a tile that contains a large icon next to the textual information. 支持单个或多个所选内容。 supports single or multiple selection. 多重选择功能允许用户从一种类似于中的项列表中选择控件。The multiple selection feature lets the user select from a list of items in a way similar to a control. 此外，用户可以激活所选的项，若要执行的任务。Additionally, the user can activate selected items to perform a task. 例如，可以使用控件来显示该应用程序可以打开和使用的文件的列表。For example, you could use a control to display a list of files that the application can then open and utilize. 用户可以选择要打开，然后双击它们以激活项并在应用程序中打开文件的文件。The user can select the files to open and then double-click them to activate the items and open the files in the application. 还可以显示复选框，使用属性，以允许用户检查他们想要对执行操作的项。The can also display check boxes, using the property, to allow the user to check the items that they want to perform an action on. 可以使用中不同的方式的控制。You can use the control in a variety of ways. 该控件用于显示应用程序、 数据库或文本文件中的信息。The control can be used to display information from an application, a database, or a text file. 还可用于从用户，如选择一组要处理的文件中获取信息。The can also be used to obtain information from the user, such as selecting a set of files to process. 提供了大量的灵活的外观和行为的属性。 provides a large number of properties that provide flexibility in appearance and behavior. 属性可以更改项的显示方式。The property allows you to change the way in which items are displayed. ， ，并属性，可以指定包含的项，和的情况下显示的图像的对象，将复选框时显示属性设置为`true`。The , , and properties allow you to specify the objects that contain the images displayed for items and, in the case of the , the check boxes that are displayed when the property is set to `true`. 若要确定哪些项检查，可以使用属性来访问集合。To determine which items are checked, you can use the property to access the collection. 属性允许访问，它存储的列标头时显示控件的属性设置为。The property allows access to the , which stores the column headers that are displayed when the property of the control is set to . 项的添加和删除来自通过属性。Items are added and removed from the through the property. 属性可以访问的控件，它提供用于操作控件中的项的方法。The property allows you to access the of the control, which provides methods for manipulating the items in the control. 如果你想要允许用户编辑项的文本，则可以使用属性。If you want to allow the user to edit the text of an item, you can use the property. 通常，当控件中包含大量的项时，很便于用户若要查看这些已排序列表中。When your control contains a large number of items, it is often easier for the user to see them in a sorted list. 可以使用属性按字母顺序对项进行排序。You can use the property to sort the items alphabetically. 你可以完全自定义外观控件。You can also completely customize the appearance of a control. 若要执行此操作，设置属性设置为`true`，并处理一个或多个以下事件： ， ， 。To do this, set the property to `true` and handle one or more of the following events: , , . 许多的属性控制是在使用时控件的属性设置为。Many of the properties of the control are used when the property of the control is set to . 属性允许的用户在控件在运行时重新配置的列的顺序。The property allows the user of your control to reconfigure the order of columns at run time. 属性允许项及其子项，而不是只是项选择。The property allows an item and its subitems to be selected instead of just the item. 若要标识的项及其子项中的边界的详细信息视图中显示网格线，可以使用属性。To display gridlines in the details view to identify the boundaries of items and subitems in the , you can use the property. 属性允许您指定的列标题，显示类型。The property allows you to specify the type of column headers to display. 一个控件可以运行在虚拟模式下，其中对象动态生成而不是存储在集合。A control can operate in virtual mode, where objects are generated dynamically instead of being stored in the collection. 这可用于处理非常大的列表或其内容频繁更改的列表。This can be useful for dealing with very large lists or lists whose contents frequently change. 若要启用虚拟模式下，设置属性设置为`true`，并处理， ，和事件。To enable Virtual mode, set the property to `true` and handle the , , and events. 除了可用于许多属性控件，有你的应用程序可用于为提供其他功能的方法和事件。In addition to the many properties that are available for a control, there are methods and events that your application can use to provide additional capabilities to the . 并方法，你可以添加到多个项时提高性能通过防止该控件添加项每次重新绘制。The and methods allow you to improve performance when you add many items to a by preventing the control from repainting every time that an item is added. 如果你控件显示的项及其子项，您可能想要在用户右键单击子项时提供的功能。If your control is displaying items and subitems, you may want to provide functionality when the user right-clicks a subitem. 若要确定其被单击的项，可以使用方法。To determine the item whose subitem is being clicked, you can use the method. 在执行验证的项的后用户已对其进行编辑时，可能想要向用户若要更改显示的特定项。When performing validation of the items after the user has edited them, you may want to display a specific item to the user to change. 可以调用方法来确保特定的项在控件的可见区域中。The method can be called to ensure that the specific item is in the visible area of the control. 如果属性设置为`true`，可以执行任务，例如验证通过创建的事件处理程序更改文本之前和之后所编辑的文本和事件。If the property set to `true`, you can perform tasks such as validating the text being edited before and after the text changed by creating an event handler for the and events. 若要执行任务，例如打开文件或显示一个对话框来编辑中显示的项，可以创建的事件处理程序事件。To perform tasks such as opening a file or displaying a dialog box to edit an item displayed in a , you can create an event handler for the event. 如果你允许用户中的项进行排序当他们单击列标题，可以创建的事件处理程序事件执行排序。If you allow the user to sort the items in a when they click a column header, you can create an event handler for the event to perform the sorting. 当属性设置为`true`，可以确定某个项的复选状态的更改发生时通过处理事件。When the property is set to `true`, you can determine when a change in an item's check state has occurred by handling the event. 此外可以设置的背景图像与属性。You can also set a background image for the with the property. 你的应用程序必须具有在其`Main`方法，以便正确显示的背景图像控件。Your application must have the on its `Main` method to correctly display the background image for the control. 此外，如果，背景图像的控件承载于 Internet Explorer 中，指定作为依赖程序集应用程序清单文件中以确保显示的属性的背景图像的 comctl32.dll 版本 6.0。In addition, if a control with a background image is hosted in Internet Explorer, specify comctl32.dll version 6.0 as a dependent assembly in the application manifest file to ensure the background image is property displayed. > [!NOTE] > 设置属性控件中的光标外观产生任何影响[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]版本 1.1 及更早版本。Setting the property for a control has no affect on the appearance of the cursor in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] versions 1.1 and earlier. Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 提供了三项功能可增强控制当应用程序调用方法： 平铺视图、 分组和插入标记。Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 provide three features that enhance the control when your application calls the method: tile view, grouping, and the insertion mark. 磁贴视图可以通过显示大图标旁边的项和子项文本平衡图形和文本信息。The tile view lets you balance graphical and textual information by displaying item and subitem text next to large icons. 设置属性设置为若要启用此行为。Set the property to to enable this behavior. 分组功能允许您以可视方式将项分组到相关的类别。The grouping feature lets you visually group items into related categories. 使用属性来添加对象添加到控制当您想要启用此功能。Use the property to add objects to the control when you want to enable this feature. 若要暂时禁用该功能，请设置属性设置为`false`。To temporarily disable the feature, set the property to `false`. 插入标记功能允许你提供拖放项重新定位提供可视反馈，以指示放置位置。The insertion mark feature lets you provide drag-and-drop item repositioning with visual feedback to indicate drop locations. 使用对象通过检索属性来显示插入标记。Use the object retrieved through the property to display the insertion mark. 这些功能是仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 下可用。These features are available only under Windows XP and Windows Server 2003. 在早期操作系统上与的这些功能相关的代码不起作用、 磁贴视图将显示为大图标视图中，和不显示插入标记和组。On earlier operating systems, the code that relate to these features has no effect, the tile view appears as the large icon view, and the insertion mark and groups do not display. 在某些情况下，可能想要编写代码来确定这些功能是否可用，并在它们不可用时提供备用的功能。In some cases, you might want to include code that determines whether these features are available, and provide alternate functionality when they are unavailable. 通过提供操作系统主题功能的同一个库提供这些功能。These features are provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要检查此库的可用性，请调用方法重载，并传入值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. 下表显示了一些成员以及它们是有效的中的视图。The following table shows some of the members and the views they are valid in. |ListView 成员ListView member|视图View| |---------------------|----------| | 属性 property| 或 or | | 属性 property| 或 or | | 方法 method|| | 属性 property| 或 or | | 事件 event|| | 方法 method|、 或 , , or | | 方法 method| 或 or | | 方法 method| 或 or | | 属性 property|之外的所有视图 All views except | | 属性 property|| | 属性 property|、 或 , , or | ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个对象也会在代码示例中提供的映像对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性在创建控件：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 此示例需要您添加到了代码和调用构造函数或在窗体上的另一种方法中的示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还需要映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. summary.span: 获取或设置用户激活某个项必须要执行的操作的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of action the user must take to activate an item.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以指定用户将如何激活中的项控件。The property allows you to specify how the user will activate an item in the control. 激活中的项不同于只需选择一个项。Activating an item in a differs from just selecting an item. 当激活某项时，通常在其中执行操作的事件处理程序事件。When an item is activated, an action is typically performed in an event handler for the event. 例如，激活某项时可能会打开一个文件或显示一个对话框，允许进行编辑的项。For example, when an item is activated you might open a file or display a dialog box that allows the item to be edited. 通常情况下，用户将其激活双击某个项。Typically, an item is double-clicked by the user to activate it. 如果属性设置为，单击项一次激活它。If the property is set to , clicking the item one time activates it. 设置属性设置为与标准的双击不同，因为两次单击可以是任何它们之间的持续时间。Setting the property to differs from the standard double-click because the two clicks can have any duration between them. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性设置为或，标签将不会允许编辑而不考虑值属性。If the property is set to or , label editing will not be allowed regardless of the value of the property.

exception.span: 指定的值不是 成员之一。

span.span: The value specified is not one of the members.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event AfterLabelEdit As LabelEditEventHandler

summary.span: 当用户编辑项的标签时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the label for an item is edited by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生在用户完成修改项的文本。The event occurs when the user finishes modifying the text for an item. 在用户键入项的新字符串传递给事件，并且事件处理程序可以拒绝更改。The new string that the user types for the item is passed to the event, and the event handler can reject the change. 如果事件处理程序会拒绝更改，如前的用户开始编辑项文本将恢复为文本。If the event handler rejects the change, the text reverts to the text as it was before the user began editing the item. > [!NOTE] > 因为事件发生之前就会提交，调用标签编辑此事件的处理程序中的方法将对使用原始值的项进行排序。Because the event takes place before the label edit is committed, calling the method in a handler for this event will sort the item using the original value. 为了使事件被引发的属性控件必须设置为`true`。In order for the event to be raised, the property of the control must be set to `true`. 可以创建的事件处理程序事件之前用户编辑项的文本执行任务。You can create an event handler for the event to perform tasks before the user edits the text of an item. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件来限制对字母表中的字符的新编辑的标签。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to restrict a newly edited label to characters in the alphabet. 该示例使用类来获取新标签的每个字符的 ASCII 字符代码。The example uses the class to obtain the ASCII character code of each character of the new label. 如果该字符表示的数字的 ASCII 代码之间处于，新标签不能应用于项。If the character falls between the ASCII codes that represent numbers, the new label cannot be applied to the item. 此示例要求您已创建控件在窗体和向其添加的项。This example requires that you have created a control on a form and added items to it. 该示例还要求是否已连接示例代码中定义的事件处理程序的事件。The example also requires that you have connected the event to the event handler defined in the example code. 若要使用类，你的文件必须包含命名空间。In order to use the class, your file must include the namespace. [!code-cpp[ListView.AfterLabelEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.AfterLabelEdit/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListView.AfterLabelEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.AfterLabelEdit/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListView.AfterLabelEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.AfterLabelEdit/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值设置属性具有不起作用，除非属性设置为。Setting the value of the property has no effect unless the property is set to . 可以使用此属性以允许用户在运行时重新列定位控件中。You can use this property to allow users to reposition columns in the control at run time. 当属性设置为`true`，用户可以放置控件以满足你的应用程序在其需求的方式显示项及其子项中的列。When the property is set to `true`, users can position the columns in the control to display the item and its subitems in a way that meets their needs within your application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个对象也会在代码示例中提供的映像对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性在创建控件：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 此示例需要您添加到了代码和调用构造函数或在窗体上的另一种方法中的示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还需要映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时在用户开始修改项的文本。The event occurs when the user starts modifying the text for an item. 如果事件处理程序取消此事件，则用户不能编辑文本。If the event handler cancels this event, the user cannot edit the text. 可以使用此事件来防止用户编辑中的特定项控件。You can use this event to prevent the user from editing specific items in the control. 如果的属性控件设置为`false`，则不会引发事件，所有在用户尝试编辑项标签会自动被拒绝。If the property of the control is set to `false`, the event is not raised; all user attempts to edit item labels are automatically rejected. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何处理事件并使用和属性。The following code example demonstrates handling the event and using the and properties. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含一个窗体名为控件`ListView1`并且填充了至少三个项。To run the example, paste the following code into a form that contains a control named `ListView1` and populated with at least three items. 请确保在示例中的事件处理程序是与其事件相关联。Ensure the event handler in the example is associated with its event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要添加到多个项的首选的方式是使用方法(通过访问属性)。The preferred way to add multiple items to a is to use the method of the (accessed through the property of the ). 这使您可以将项的数组添加到单个操作中的列表。This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation. 但是，如果你想要添加项时使用的其中一个方法类，可以使用方法，以防止重新绘制控件每次添加一个项。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method of the class, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the every time that an item is added. 完成将项添加到控件的任务后，调用方法，以使重绘。When you have completed the task of adding items to the control, call the method to enable the to repaint. 这种方法添加项可以防止闪烁的绘图大量项添加到控件时。This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the when lots of items are being added to the control. 如果调用一次以上，必须调用相同数目的时间。If is called more than once, must be called an equivalent number of times. 直到上次调用不会重新绘制。Until the last call to the will not repaint. 除此之外，多次调用不起作用。Other than this, multiple calls to have no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化控件，以包含复选框。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control to contain check boxes. 它还演示了如何使用和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the and methods. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含一个窗体名为`ListView1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a named `ListView1`. 调用`InititalizeListView`方法从窗体的构造函数或`Load`方法。Call the `InititalizeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 才会发生此事件时是`true`。This event only occurs when is `true`. 处理此事件允许可更新项信息保存在缓存中，以便能轻松获得。Handling this event allows the to update the item information held in the cache so that it is readily available. 这可以提高大列表或列表的项是计算成本很高的性能。This can improve performance on large lists, or lists whose items are expensive to calculate. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序会检查以确保缓存刷新时才真正需要，然后重新生成缓存。In the example, the event handler checks to make sure a cache refresh is really necessary, and then rebuilds the cache. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分属性。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您在列表中显示每个项旁边的复选框。The property allows you to display a check box next to each item in the list. 这使应用程序能够显示的项的列表 (和子项如果属性设置为`View.Details`) 用户可以选择通过单击复选框。This enables your application to display a list of items (and subitems if the property is set to `View.Details`) that the user can select by clicking the check box. 属性提供了一种方法来选择多个项目中的而无需使用 CTRL 键的控件。The property offers a way to select multiple items in the control without using the CTRL key. 具体取决于您的应用程序，使用复选框可选择项，而不是标准多个选择方法可能会为用户更方便。Depending on your application, using check boxes to select items rather than the standard multiple selection method may be easier for the user. 即使的属性控件设置为`false`，仍可以显示复选框，并向用户提供多个所选内容功能。Even if the property of the control is set to `false`, you can still display checkboxes and provide multiple selection capabilities to the user. 如果你想要选择多个项还仍想要允许用户从要执行应用程序中的某个操作的列表中选择多个项，此功能很有用。This feature can be useful if you do not want multiple items to be selected yet still want to allow the user to choose multiple items from the list to perform an operation within your application. 若要确定已选中项时，创建的事件处理程序事件。To determine when an item has been checked, create an event handler for the event. 若要获取所有签入的项，使用属性来访问控件。To get all the items that are checked in the , use the property to access the for the control. 若要获取所有签入的项的索引，使用属性。To get the indexes of all items that are checked in the , use the property. 如果中指定属性中，在 0 和 1 中的索引位置的映像显示而不是复选框。If an is specified in the property, the images at index positions 0 and 1 in the are displayed instead of the check box. 将显示的图像索引位置 0 处而不是未选中的复选框，并将显示的图像索引位置 1 处而不是选中的复选框。The image at index position 0 is displayed instead of the unchecked check box, and the image at index position 1 is displayed instead of the checked check box. > [!NOTE] > 此属性设置为`true`，则事件发生。When you set this property to `true`, the event occurs. > > 复选框不显示何时属性设置为。Check boxes are not displayed when the property is set to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个对象也会在代码示例中提供的映像对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性在创建控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例需要您添加到了代码和调用构造函数或在窗体上的另一种方法中的示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还需要映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DrawItem As DrawListViewItemEventHandler

summary.span: 在绘制 并且 属性设置为 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a is drawn and the property is set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件，可以自定义的外观使用所有者描述的控件。This event lets you customize the appearance of a control using owner drawing. 将引发此事件时，才属性设置为`true`。It is raised only when the property is set to `true`. 有关所有者描述的详细信息，请参阅属性参考主题。For more information about owner drawing, see the property reference topic. 事件可以针对每个发生项。The event can occur for each item. 当属性设置为，则和事件也可能发生。When the property is set to , the and events also occur. 在这种情况下，可以处理事件以绘制到所有项，如在后台，常见的元素并处理事件以绘制为各个子项，如文本值的元素。In this case, you can handle the event to draw elements common to all items, such as the background, and handle the event to draw elements for individual subitems, such as text values. 此外可以在中绘制的所有项尽管这可能是不太方便使用的两个事件之一的控制。You can also draw all items in the control using only one of the two events, although this may be less convenient. 若要在详细信息视图中绘制列标题，你必须处理事件。To draw column headers in the details view, you must handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 由于在基础 Win32 控件中，一个 bug事件发生而不使用随附当鼠标指针移动到行的详细信息视图中的每一行的事件，从而导致的任何内容中绘制事件处理程序为绘制自定义背景中绘制转移事件处理程序。Because of a bug in the underlying Win32 control, the event occurs without accompanying events once per row in the details view when the mouse pointer moves over the row, causing anything painted in a event handler to be painted over by a custom background drawn in a event handler. 请参阅中的示例额外事件发生时使每行一种解决方法的参考主题。See the example in the reference topic for a workaround that invalidates each row when the extra event occurs. 备用解决方法是将所有自定义绘制代码放入事件处理程序和画图整个项 （包括子项） 的背景时，才值为 0。An alternative workaround is to put all your custom drawing code in a event handler and paint the background for the entire item (including subitems) only when the value is 0. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供的实现事件处理程序。The following code example provides an implementation of a event handler. 有关完整示例，请参阅参考主题。For the complete example, see the reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件，可以自定义的外观使用所有者描述的控件。This event lets you customize the appearance of a control using owner drawing. 将引发此事件时，才属性设置为`true`并属性设置为。It is raised only when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to . 所有者描述的详细信息，请参阅属性参考主题。For more information on owner drawing, see the property reference topic. > [!NOTE] > 子项信息通常显示在磁贴视图中，以及的详细信息视图，但在磁贴视图中，它必须绘制的处理程序中事件。Subitem information typically appears in the tile view as well as the details view, but in the tile view, it must be drawn in a handler for the event. 事件可以针对每个发生子项。The event can occur for each subitem. 您可以处理事件以绘制到所有子项，例如背景，常见的元素并处理事件以绘制为各个子项，如文本值的元素。You can handle the event to draw elements common to all subitems, such as the background, and handle the event to draw elements for individual subitems, such as text values. 此外可以在中绘制的所有项尽管这可能是不太方便使用的两个事件之一的控制。You can also draw all items in the control using only one of the two events, although this may be less convenient. 若要在详细信息视图中绘制列标题，你必须处理事件。To draw column headers in the details view, you must handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 事件不会发生的没有为其任何子项对象已添加到集合。The event does not occur for any subitems for which no object has been added to the collection. 另请注意，每个的第一个子项对象表示的父项本身，并且将显示在第一列。Note also that the first subitem of each object represents the parent item itself, and is displayed in the first column. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供的实现事件处理程序。The following code example provides an implementation of a event handler. 有关完整示例，请参阅参考主题。For the complete example, see the reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要添加到多个项的首选的方式是使用方法(通过访问属性)。The preferred way to add multiple items to a is to use the method of the (accessed through the property of the ). 这使您可以将项的数组添加到单个操作中的列表。This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation. 但是，如果你想要添加项时使用的其中一个方法类，可以使用方法，以防止重新绘制控件每次添加一个项。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method of the class, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the each time an item is added. 完成将项添加到控件的任务后，调用方法，以使重绘。Once you have completed the task of adding items to the control, call the method to enable the to repaint. 这种方法添加项可以防止闪烁的绘图大量的项添加到控件时。This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the when a large number of items are being added to the control. 如果调用一次以上，必须调用相同数目的时间。If is called more than once, must be called an equivalent number of times. 直到上次调用不会重新绘制。Until the last call to the will not repaint. 除此之外，多次调用不起作用。Other than this, multiple calls to have no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化控件，以包含复选框。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control to contain check boxes. 它还演示如何使用和方法。It also demonstrates using the and methods. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个窗体，其中包含名为`ListView1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form containing a named `ListView1`. 调用`InititalizeListView`方法从窗体的构造函数或`Load`方法。Call the `InititalizeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. summary.span: 确保指定项在控件中是可见的，必要时滚动控件的内容。

span.span: Ensures that the specified item is visible within the control, scrolling the contents of the control if necessary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此方法以确保特定项目内可见控件。You can use this method to ensure that a specific item is visible within the control. 中的项上执行验证时，可以调用方法，以确保未通过验证项目会显示在控件，以允许用户执行更改的项。When performing validation on the items in a , you can call the method to ensure that an item that failed validation is displayed in the control to allow the user to perform changes on the item. 如果你想要确保项可见，位于可视区域的上方控件，调用方法将会滚动控件的内容，直到该控件的可视区域的第一项。If the item that you want to ensure is visible is located above the viewable region of the control, calling the method will scroll the contents of the control until it is the first item in the viewable area of the control. 如果该项是可视区域的下方控件，调用方法将会滚动的内容控制直到项控件的可视区域的最后一项。If the item is below the viewable region of the control, calling the method will scroll the contents of the control until the item is the last item in the viewable area of the control. 若要确定某个项的显示区域的顶部是否位于控制，请使用属性。To determine if an item is located at the top of the display area of a control, use the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜索不区分大小写。The search is case-insensitive. `text`参数可以指定所需的匹配文本的子字符串。The `text` parameter can specify a substring of the desired matching text. 此外，此方法将返回具有指定文本开头的第一个项。In addition, this method will return the first item that starts with the specified text. 例如，如果包含两个列表项的第一个项的文本设置为"尖括号"和第二个项的文本设置为"bracket"的调用传递`brack`作为该参数将返回其文本为"bracket"的条目。For example, if a contains two list items - the first item's text set to "angle bracket" and the second item's text set to "bracket" - a call to passing `brack` as the parameter will return the item whose text is "bracket". 方法将返回`null`如果列表为空或没有匹配项。The method returns `null` if the list is empty or there is no matching item. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了方法。The following code example demonstrates the method. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体并调用`InitializeFindListView`方法从窗体的构造函数或事件处理程序。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializeFindListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 单击此按钮以查看方法调用的结果。Click the button to see the results of the method call. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回，表示当前正在显示的聚焦框的项控件。The property returns the that represents the item currently displaying the focus rectangle for the control. 因为控件具有不与它显示的项没有直接可编辑区域时控件有焦点中的项显示焦点标线围绕其项文本。Because a control has no directly editable areas other than the items it displays, when the control has focus, an item within the displays the focus reticle around its item text. 通常情况下，最后选择的项在控件是具有焦点的项。Typically, the last selected item in the control is the item with focus. 虽然某项可能显示焦点标线，但实际上它可能不是中的选定的项。Although an item may be the one displaying the focus reticle, it may not actually be a selected item in the . 使用或属性来获取中的选定的项控件，不一定是选择属性。Use the or properties to obtain the selected items in the control, the property is not necessarily selected. 可以使用属性来确定哪一项进行最后一次单击中控件，而不考虑所选内容状态。You can use the property to determine which item was last clicked in the control, regardless of selection state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性具有不起作用，除非的属性控件设置为。The property has no effect unless the property of the control is set to . 通常是属性时使用具有许多子项和它的显示项是重要的是能够查看所选的项，项文本不可见时由于水平滚动的控件的内容。The property is typically used when a displays items with many subitems and it is important to be able to see selected items when the item text is not visible due to horizontal scrolling of the control's contents. > [!NOTE] > 当设置为`true`的工具提示将不会显示; 仅父级的工具提示显示。When is set to `true`, ToolTips for a will not be shown; only the ToolTip for the parent is displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个对象也会在代码示例中提供的映像对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性在创建控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例需要您添加到了代码和调用构造函数或在窗体上的另一种方法中的示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还需要映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可确定哪些项所在的客户端区域内的特定位置控件。The method lets you determine which item is located at a specific location within the client region of the control. 当用户单击或右击子项时，可以使用此方法 (当属性设置为`View.Details`) 并且你想要确定哪一项拥有基于鼠标的坐标，在用户单击鼠标时单击该子项.You can use this method when the user clicks or right-clicks a subitem (when the property is set to `View.Details`) and you want to determine which item owns the subitem that was clicked based on the mouse coordinates at the time the user clicked the mouse. > [!NOTE] > 当属性值是`false`，仅当指定的位置位于父项 （这在控件处于详细信息模式时，第一列中显示） 的边界内时，此方法返回一个项。When the property value is `false`, this method returns an item only when the specified location is within the bounds of the parent item (which is displayed in the first column when the control is in details mode). 必须设置属性设置为`true`若要使用此方法时指定的边界内的子项的位置检索项。You must set the property to `true` to retrieve an item with this method given a location within the bounds of a subitem. 此外可以使用方法来检索有关特定位置处的项的详细的信息。You can also use the method to retrieve detailed information about the item at a particular location. 若要执行拖放项内的重定位，你可能想要使用方法而不是方法。To do drag-and-drop repositioning of items within a , you might want to use the method rather than the method. 方法查找最近的项而不考虑在鼠标指针所在的位置。The method finds the closest item regardless of where the mouse pointer is located. 方法，但是，返回`null`如果指定位置处没有项。The method, on the other hand, returns `null` if there is no item at the specified location. > [!NOTE] > 仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 上支持类，当应用程序调用方法。The class is supported only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将和控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the and controls. 通过设置初始化并属性使用和枚举，分别。The is initialized by setting the and properties using the and enumerations, respectively. 填入示例目录中的图片。The is populated with pictures from the Samples directory. 方法中处理时使用控件的事件以确定是否选择了某项。The method is used in when handling the control's event to determine whether an item is selected. 如果选择的项，事件处理程序将显示所选的文件通过设置属性。If an item is selected, the event handler displays the selected file by setting the property. 该示例需要 JPG 文件位于 C:\documents and Settings\All Users\Documents\My 收藏 \ 示例图片目录中存在。The example requires the existence of JPG files located in the C:\documents and Settings\All Users\Documents\My Pictures\Sample Pictures directory. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`InitializePictureBox`并`PopulateListView`窗体的构造函数中的方法或`Load`方法。To run this example, paste the code into a form and call the `InitializePictureBox` and `PopulateListView` methods in the form's constructor or `Load` method. 请确保所有事件都都具有其事件处理程序相关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性具有不起作用，除非的属性控件设置为。The property has no effect unless the property of the control is set to . 属性可用于显示行，以确定行和列中显示的控件在显示项和及其子项。The property allows you to display lines to identify the rows and columns that are displayed in the control when it displays items and their subitems. 显示网格线不提供能够调整行和列大小为应用程序，如 Microsoft Excel 那样。The grid lines that are displayed do not provide the ability to resize rows and columns as an application such as Microsoft Excel does. 只有列可调整大小，如果显示列标题，并通过将鼠标指针移动到要调整大小的列的右侧，然后单击并拖动直到列所需的大小。Only columns can be resized, if column headers are displayed, by moving the mouse pointer to the right side of the column to resize and then clicking and dragging until the column is the size you want. 网格线功能用于控件的用户提供可视项及其子项的周围的边界。The grid lines feature is used to provide the user of the control with visible boundaries around items and subitems. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个对象也会在代码示例中提供的映像对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性在创建控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例需要您添加到了代码和调用构造函数或在窗体上的另一种方法中的示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还需要映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分组功能允许你创建的逻辑相关的可视化组项。The grouping feature lets you create visual groups of logically related items. 每个组包含的文本标题后跟一条水平线和分配给该组的项。Each group consists of a textual header followed by a horizontal line and the items assigned to that group. 您可以对齐到 left、 right 或控件居中的标头文本。You can align the header text to the left, right, or center of the control. 分配给任何组控件显示每当属性设置为值。Any groups assigned to a control appear whenever the property is set to a value other than . 组帮助用户找到它们正在寻找分隔到实用类别项的项。 groups help your users find the items they are looking for by separating the items into useful categories. 可以创建所需的任何类别。You can create whatever categories you need. 一个典型的方法是基于对列表进行排序的方式对项进行分组。One typical approach is to group the items based on the way the list is sorted. 例如，可以按项名称的首字母分组项，按字母顺序或类型或通过单击详细信息视图中的列标题列表进行排序时的日期等的子项列表进行排序时。For example, you can group the items by the initial letter of the item name when the list is sorted alphabetically or by subitems such as type or date when the list is sorted by clicking a column header in the details view. Windows 资源管理器使用此类型的分组。Windows Explorer uses this type of grouping. 若要使用的分组功能，添加一个或多个对象添加到的集合控件。To use the grouping feature, add one or more objects to the collection of a control. 在中设置组标题文本和标题对齐方式构造函数中，将其设置或使用和属性。Set the group header text and header alignment in the constructor, or set them using the and properties. 若要暂时禁用的分组功能，请设置属性设置为`false`。To temporarily disable the grouping feature, set the property to `false`. 通过指定中的组分配到组项构造函数中的，通过设置属性，或通过直接添加到项组的集合。You can assign an item to a group by specifying the group in the constructor, by setting the property, or by directly adding the item to the collection of a group. 所有项应都分配到组，才能显示。All items should be assigned to groups before they are displayed. 未分配给组的任何项目将出现在默认组，它具有标题标签"DefaultGroup{0}"。Any items that are not assigned to a group will appear in the default group, which has the header label "DefaultGroup{0}". 中不包含默认组集合，并且不能更改。The default group is not contained in the collection, and cannot be altered. 它是主要适用于调试以确保所有项已正确都添加到组。It is primarily useful in debugging to ensure that all items have been properly added to groups. 项一次只能是一个组中。An item can only be in one group at a time. 你可以通过设置项所属组属性在运行时或通过将其添加到另一个组，会自动将其从上一组中删除的集合。You can change the group to which an item belongs by setting the property at run time or by adding it to the collection of another group, which automatically removes it from the previous group. 使用组时，插入标记功能被禁用。The insertion mark feature is disabled when using groups. 这是由于分组功能通过组成员身份的项时，插入标记功能用于在重新定位拖放不排序其项的控件。This is because the grouping feature orders items by group membership, while the insertion mark feature is used with drag-and-drop repositioning in a control that does not already order its items. 当你的应用程序调用时，组是仅适用于 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003方法。 groups are available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the method. 在早期操作系统上与组相关的任何代码不起作用和组将不会出现。On earlier operating systems, any code relating to groups has no effect and the groups will not appear. 因此，任何代码都依赖于分组功能可能无法正常工作。As a result, any code that depends on the grouping feature might not work correctly. 可能想要编写代码来确定分组功能是否可用，并且不可用时提供备用的功能。You might want to include code that determines whether the grouping feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable. 例如，你可能想要提供备用排序时不支持按组排序的操作系统上运行。For example, you might want to provide alternate sorting when running on operating systems that do not support sorting by group. 由提供操作系统主题功能的同一个库提供的分组功能。The grouping feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要检查此库的可用性，请调用方法重载，并传入值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用分组功能，以将项目组织的详细信息视图中的子项值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the grouping feature to organize items by subitem value in the details view. 这种形式是分组的类似于在 Windows 资源管理器中使用的分组。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在示例中，组是动态创建的。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 对于每个子项列中，为每个唯一子项值创建一个组。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 父项列中，为每个唯一的首字母创建一个组。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 单击列标题对项排序成为该列创建的组。Clicking the header of a column sorts the items into the groups created for that column. 再次单击同一个列标题的组的顺序反转。Clicking the same column header again reverses the order of the groups. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CPP/listviewgroupsexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CS/listviewgroupsexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/VB/listviewgroupsexample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您指定的类型时要显示的列标题的属性控件设置为并控件具有中指定的对象.The property allows you to specify the type of column headers to display when the property of the control is set to and the control has objects specified in the . 对象定义中显示的列控件。 objects define the columns that are displayed in the control. 每一列用于显示中每个项的子项信息。Each column is used to display subitem information for each item in the . 属性可以指定是否是可见的列标题或它们是否可见，无论他们将充当可单击的按钮。The property allows you to specify whether the column headers are visible or, if they are visible, whether they will function as clickable buttons. 如果属性设置为，不显示列标题，尽管项及其子项的仍会按列排列控件。If the property is set to , the column headers are not displayed, although the items and subitems of the control are still arranged in columns. 如果属性设置为，则列标题就像按钮一样，用户可以单击来执行操作，例如对中的项进行排序控制在所单击的列作为键使用的项。If the property is set to , the column headers act like buttons that users can click to carry out an action, such as sorting the items in the control using the items in the clicked column as a key. 可以在一个处理程序中实现此行为事件。You can implement this behavior in a handler for the event. 如果属性设置为，列标题会显示，但不能单击。If the property is set to , the column headers appear, but cannot be clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了允许选择多个项。The following code example demonstrates a that allows multiple items to be selected. 该示例演示了如何设置和属性。The example demonstrates setting the and properties. 它还演示了，和属性。It also demonstrates the , and properties. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含一个窗体名为对象`ListView1`和一个名为`TextBox1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. 调用`InitializeListView`方法从窗体的构造函数或事件处理程序。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为`true`，用户可以指向中的项控件以选择的项目。When this property is set to `true`, the user can point to an item in the control to select the item. 可以选择多个项 (当属性设置为 true) 通过在指向每个项时按住 CTRL 键。Multiple items can be selected (when the property is set to true) by holding down the CTRL key while pointing to each item. 可以使用此功能为您的应用程序中选择项目的用户提供更简单的方法控件。You can use this feature to provide an easier method for the user of your application to select items in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 插入标记功能可让你以可视方式指示在拖放操作中的预期的放置位置时某一项拖动到新位置。The insertion mark feature lets you visually indicate the expected drop location in a drag-and-drop operation when an item is dragged to a new position. 此功能时才起作用属性设置为`true`以及何时控件不会自动排序项。This feature works only when the property is set to `true` and when the control does not sort the items automatically. 若要防止自动排序属性必须设置为并属性必须设置为， ，或。To prevent automatic sorting, the property must be set to and the property must be set to , , or . 此外，插入标记功能可能无法看到与由于分组功能进行排序的组成员身份的项分组功能。Additionally, the insertion mark feature may not be visible with the grouping feature because the grouping feature orders the items by group membership. 的处理程序中通常使用类或事件来更新插入标记的位置，如拖动项。The class is typically used in a handler for the or event to update the position of the insertion mark as an item is dragged. 中的处理程序也使用或事件以便在正确的位置将拖动的项。It is also used in a handler for the or event to insert a dragged item at the correct location. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[如何：Windows 窗体 ListView 控件中显示插入标记](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-an-insertion-mark-in-a-windows-forms-listview-control.md)。For more information, see and [How to: Display an Insertion Mark in a Windows Forms ListView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-an-insertion-mark-in-a-windows-forms-listview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 当你的应用程序调用时，插入标记功能是仅适用于 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003方法。The insertion mark feature is available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the method. 在早期的操作系统中，与插入标记相关的任何代码都不会有影响，并且插入标记也不会出现。On earlier operating systems, any code relating to the insertion mark has no effect and the insertion mark will not appear. 因此，插入标记功能所依赖的任何代码可能无法正常工作。As a result, any code that depends on the insertion mark feature might not work correctly. 可能想要编写代码来确定此功能是否可用，并且不可用时提供备用的功能。You might want to include code that determines whether this feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable. 例如，你可能想要绕过实现拖放项重新定位时不支持插入标记的操作系统上运行的所有代码。For example, you might want to bypass all code that implements drag-and-drop item repositioning when running on operating systems that do not support insertion marks. > > 插入标记功能提供的同一个库提供操作系统主题功能。The insertion mark feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要检查此库的可用性，请调用方法重载，并传入值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用插入标记功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use the insertion mark feature. 此示例中实现拖放项重新排序功能使用标准的拖动事件。This example implements drag-and-drop item reordering using the standard drag events. 插入标记的位置更新处理程序中事件。The position of the insertion mark is updated in a handler for the event. 在此处理程序中，鼠标指针的位置进行比较的中点的最近的项，并使用结果以确定左侧或右侧的项是否显示插入标记。In this handler, the position of the mouse pointer is compared to the midpoint of the nearest item, and the result is used to determine whether the insertion mark appears to the left or the right of the item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户激活中的一个或多个项事件时发生控件。The event occurs when the user activates one or more items in the control. 用户可以通过激活某项单击或双击，具体取决于值属性，或使用键盘。The user can activate an item with either a single-click or double-click, depending on the value of the property, or with the keyboard. 从事件处理程序中事件，可以引用或属性，以访问该集合中选择的项的来确定哪些项被激活。From within the event handler for the event, you can reference the or properties to access the collection of items selected in the to determine which items are being activated. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. span.span: Occurs when the check state of an item changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性必须设置为真，复选框，以在每个项旁边显示控件。The property must be set to true in order for check boxes to be displayed next to each item in the control. 项的复选状态发生更改时或当事件发生属性设置为`true`。The event occurs when the check state of an item changes or when the property is set to `true`. 可以创建的事件处理程序事件，以便执行任务，例如更改项的图标或另一个特定于应用程序的任务的状态每次签入项时控件。You can create an event handler for the event to perform tasks such as changing the state of an item's icon or another application-specific task each time an item is checked in the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果窗口句柄尚未创建时引发事件，该事件将被延迟。If the window handle has not been created when the event is raised, the event will be delayed. （显示在窗体） 时创建的窗口句柄后，任何延迟将引发事件。Once the window handle is created (when the form is shown), any delayed events will be raised. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个选中处理控件事件。The following code example demonstrates a checked control that handles the event. 该方法使用和属性来检索并计算所选的菜单项的价格。The method uses the and properties to retrieve and tally the price of the menu items selected. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个窗体，其中包含`ListView`名为`ListView1`和一个`TextBox`名为`Textbox1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form containing a `ListView` named `ListView1` and a `TextBox` named `Textbox1`. 调用`InititalizeListView`方法从窗体的构造函数或`Load`方法。Call the `InititalizeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. 确保事件是与在此示例中的事件处理程序相关联。Ensure that the event is associated with the event handler in this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以指定包含显示项以大图标时要使用的图标的对象 (当属性设置为)。The property allows you to specify an object that contains icons to use when displaying items with large icons (when the property is set to ). 控件可以接受任何图形格式控件支持时显示的图标。The control can accept any graphics format that the control supports when displaying icons. 控件并不局限于.ico 文件。The control is not limited to .ico files. 一次分配给属性，可以设置每个属性中控件中的相应图像的索引位置到。Once an is assigned to the property, you can set the property of each in the control to the index position of the appropriate image in the . 有关图标的大小指定的。The size of the icons for the is specified by the . 因为只有一个索引可以为指定属性，中指定的对象和属性应具有相同的索引位置的显示的图像。Because only one index can be specified for the property, the objects specified in the and properties should have the same index positions for the images to display. 例如，如果的属性设置为 0，以用于小型和大型图标图像应为相同的索引位置中中指定的对象和属性。For example, if the property of a is set to 0, the images to use for both small and large icons should be at the same index position in the objects specified in the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 图像指定了密钥，仍需要将该映像的小型和大型版本放在其各自的图像列表中的同一个索引位置。When the images are specified with keys, you still need to place small and large versions of the image at the same index location in their respective image lists. 视图之间切换时，一个列表中的图像的索引位置用于在其他列表中，而不考虑指定的密钥值找到该图像。When switching between views, the index location of the image in one list is used to locate the image in the other list, regardless of the key value specified. 若要设置项以小图标显示时要使用 (以外的所有视图模式)，使用属性。To set the to use when displaying items with small icons (all view modes other than ), use the property. 如果你想要使用映像来显示项状态，请使用属性。If you want to use images to display item state, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个对象也会在代码示例中提供的映像对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性在创建控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例需要您添加到了代码和调用构造函数或在窗体上的另一种方法中的示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还需要映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于控件的排序比较器。

span.span: Gets or sets the sorting comparer for the control.

value.span: ，表示用于控件的排序比较器。

span.span: An that represents the sorting comparer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以指定执行中的项的排序的对象控制何时调用方法或项目添加到列表中时。The property allows you to specify the object that performs the sorting of items in a control when the method is called or when items are added to the list. 其标签文本发生更改时，请注意，项不进行自动排序。Note that items are not sorted automatically when their label text changes. 指定的对象必须实现的类的实例接口，只有一个方法调用。The specified object must be an instance of a class that implements the interface, which has a single method called . 此属性可用于提供自定义排序，例如，在详细信息视图中单击列标题。You can use this property to provide custom sorting, for example, when a column header is clicked in the details view. 若要执行此操作，创建一个实现类接口，并提供一个构造函数接受要作为排序依据的列的索引。To do this, create a class that implements the interface and provides a constructor that accepts the index of a column to sort by. 然后，可以实现的处理程序创建使用所单击的列索引此类的实例的事件。You can then implement a handler for the event that creates an instance of this class using the index of the clicked column. 当您将设置属性设置为的新实例，控件自动排序时使用指定的对象。When you set the property to the new instance, the control is automatically sorted using the specified object. 对后续调用方法使用相同的对象。Subsequent calls to the method use the same object. > [!NOTE] > 如果设置的值属性，自动调用方法。When you set the value of the property, the method is called automatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个包含窗体项中的列时手动进行排序的控件单击控件。The following code example creates a form that contains a control that manually sorts items when a column in the control is clicked. 该示例定义一个名为类`ListViewItemComparer`，它实现执行接口比较。The example defines a class called `ListViewItemComparer` that implements the interface that performs the comparison. 该示例创建的实例`ListViewItemComparer`并使用它来设置属性的控件。The example creates an instance of `ListViewItemComparer` and uses it to set the property of the control. 方法中调用事件处理程序使用中定义的方法`ListViewItemComparer`执行基于所单击列的项排序。The method call in the event handler uses the methods defined in `ListViewItemComparer` to perform the sort of items, based on the column that is clicked. [!code-cpp[ListView.ColumnClick#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.ColumnClick/CPP/listviewsort1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListView.ColumnClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.ColumnClick/CS/listviewsort1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListView.ColumnClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.ColumnClick/VB/listviewsort1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以选择多个项。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether multiple items can be selected.

value.span: 如果可以一次选择控件中的多个项，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if multiple items in the control can be selected at one time; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`，可以选择多个项中控件。When the property is set to `true`, multiple items can be selected in the control. 若要选择多个项，用户必须按下 CTRL 键同时单击要选择的项。To select multiple items, the user must hold down the CTRL key while clicking the items to select. 通过单击要选择的第一个项，然后在按住 SHIFT 键，单击要选择的最后一个项的同时，可以选择连续的项。Consecutive items can be selected by clicking the first item to select and then, while holding down the SHIFT key, clicking the last item to select. 可以使用多重选择功能选择中的多个项目控制和选择的所有项上执行操作。You can use the multiple selection feature to select multiple items in the control and perform an operation on all the items selected. 例如，用户可以选择多个项，然后右键单击选定的项，显示快捷菜单，显示一组可以对所选项目执行的任务。For example, the user could select multiple items and then right-click a selected item to display a shortcut menu that displays a set of tasks that can be performed on the selected items. 若要确定哪些项选择中控制，请使用属性。To determine which items are selected in the control, use the property. 属性可以访问，其中包含选定项的列表。The property allows you to access the that contains a list of the selected items. 如果想要的索引位置中而不是项，可以使用属性来访问。If you want the index positions in the instead of the items, you can use the property to access the . 如果您不想要允许多个选择中的，但仍想要将为用户提供一种方法，以便多个项可以通过设置显示复选框，选择属性设置为`true`。If you do not want to allow multiple selections in the , yet still want to offer the user a way for multiple items to be chosen, you can display check boxes by setting the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了允许选择多个项。The following code example demonstrates a that allows multiple items to be selected. 该示例演示了如何设置和属性。The example demonstrates setting the and properties. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含一个窗体名为对象`ListView1`和一个名为`TextBox1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. 调用`InitializeListView`方法从窗体的构造函数或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件来限制对字母表中的字符的新编辑的标签。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to restrict a newly edited label to characters in the alphabet. 该示例使用类来获取新标签的每个字符的 ASCII 字符代码。The example uses the class to obtain the ASCII character code of each character of the new label. 如果该字符表示的数字的 ASCII 代码之间处于，新标签不能应用于项。If the character falls between the ASCII codes that represent numbers, the new label cannot be applied to the item. 此示例要求您已创建控件在窗体和向其添加的项。This example requires that you have created a control on a form and added items to it. 该示例还要求是否已连接示例代码中定义的事件处理程序的事件。The example also requires that you have connected the event to the event handler defined in the example code. 若要使用类，你的文件必须包含命名空间。In order to use the class, your file must include the namespace. [!code-cpp[ListView.AfterLabelEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.AfterLabelEdit/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListView.AfterLabelEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.AfterLabelEdit/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListView.AfterLabelEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.AfterLabelEdit/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool OwnerDraw { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.OwnerDraw : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件是由操作系统绘制，还是由您提供的代码绘制。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is drawn by the operating system or by code that you provide.

value.span: 如果 控件由您提供的代码绘制，则为 ；如果 控件由操作系统绘制，则为 。

span.span: if the control is drawn by code that you provide; if the control is drawn by the operating system.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个控件通常由操作系统绘制。A control is normally drawn by the operating system. 若要自定义的外观项、 子项和列标题集属性设置为`true`，并为一个或多个以下事件提供处理程序： ， ， 。In order to customize the appearance of items, subitems, and column headers, set the property to `true` and provide a handler for one or more of the following events: , , . 这称为所有者描述。This is called owner drawing. 当属性设置为，所有三个事件发生; 否则为仅事件发生。When the property is set to , all three events occur; otherwise, only the event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 子项信息通常显示在磁贴视图中，以及的详细信息视图，但在磁贴视图中，它必须绘制的处理程序中事件。Subitem information typically appears in the tile view as well as the details view, but in the tile view, it must be drawn in a handler for the event. 事件不会发生的没有为其任何子项对象已添加到集合。The event does not occur for any subitems for which no object has been added to the collection. 另请注意，每个的第一个子项对象表示的父项本身，并且将显示在第一列。Note also that the first subitem of each object represents the parent item itself, and is displayed in the first column. 在详细信息视图中，您可以处理事件以绘制到所有子项，例如背景，常见的元素并处理事件以绘制为各个子项，如文本值的元素。In the details view, you can handle the event to draw elements common to all subitems, such as the background, and handle the event to draw elements for individual subitems, such as text values. 此外可以在中绘制的所有项尽管这可能是不太方便使用的两个事件之一的控制。You can also draw all items in the control using only one of the two events, although this may be less convenient. 若要在详细信息视图中绘制列标题，你必须处理事件。To draw column headers in the details view, you must handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 若要避免当所有者描述，重写时，图形闪烁的问题控件，并设置属性设置为`true`。To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the control and set the property to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何提供有关自定义绘图控件。The following code example demonstrates how to provide custom drawing for a control. 在示例中的控件具有渐变背景。The control in the example has a gradient background. 子项并将负值有红色的前景色和背景为黑色。Subitems with negative values have a red foreground and a black background. 处理程序事件绘制整个项的背景。A handler for the event draws the background for entire items. 处理程序事件绘制的文本值以及文本和背景具有负值的子项。A handler for the event draws the text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 处理程序事件绘制每个列标题。A handler for the event draws each column header. 一个组件提供了一种方法的详细信息视图和列表视图之间进行切换。A component provides a way to switch between the details view and the list view. 在列表视图中，仅引发事件。In the list view, only the event is raised. 在这种情况下，文本和背景均在事件处理程序。In this case, the text and background are both drawn in the event handler. remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合发生更改时属性的更改。The collection changes whenever the property of a changes. 可以以编程方式进行属性更改，或当用户选择一项或清除选择的项。The property change can occur programmatically or when the user selects an item or clears the selection of an item. 当用户选择某个项而无需按 ctrl 键来执行多个选择时，该控件首先会清除以前的选择。When the user selects an item without pressing CTRL to perform a multiple selection, the control first clears the previous selection. 在这种情况下，为每个以前选择的项的一次，一次新选定的项，将发生此事件。In this case, this event occurs one time for each item that was previously selected and one time for the newly selected item. 若要确定哪些项选择中控制，请使用属性来访问。To determine which items are selected in the control, use the property to access the . 可以创建此事件，以便对中的选定项的更改时执行任务的事件处理程序控件。You can create an event handler for this event to perform tasks whenever there is a change to the selected items in the control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，事件，成员，并且类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property, event, members, and the class. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含一个窗体名为对象`ListView1`和一个名为`TextBox1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. 调用`InitializeListView`方法从窗体的构造函数或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. 此示例需要该事件处理程序与正确关联事件This example requires that the event handler is correctly associated with the event [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 ，当项在控件中显示为小图标时使用。

value.span: ，包含将 属性设置为 时要使用的图标。

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以指定包含显示带小图标的项时要使用的图标的对象 (当属性设置为任何值)。The property allows you to specify an object that contains icons to use when displaying items with small icons (when the property is set to any value other than ). 控件可以接受任何图形格式控件支持时显示的图标。The control can accept any graphics format that the control supports when displaying icons. 控件并不局限于.ico 文件。The control is not limited to .ico files. 一次分配给属性，可以设置每个属性中控件中的相应图像的索引位置到。Once an is assigned to the property, you can set the property of each in the control to the index position of the appropriate image in the . 有关图标的大小指定的属性。The size of the icons for the is specified by the property. 因为只有一个索引可以为指定属性，中指定的对象和属性应具有相同的索引位置的显示的图像。Because only one index can be specified for the property, the objects specified in the and properties should have the same index positions for the images to display. 例如，如果的属性设置为 0，以用于小型和大型图标图像应为相同的索引位置中中指定的对象和属性。For example, if the property of a is set to 0, the images to use for both small and large icons should be at the same index position in the objects specified in the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 图像指定了密钥，仍需要将该映像的小型和大型版本放在其各自的图像列表中的同一个索引位置。When the images are specified with keys, you still need to place small and large versions of the image at the same index location in their respective image lists. 视图之间切换时，一个列表中的图像的索引位置用于在其他列表中，而不考虑指定的密钥值找到该图像。When switching between views, the index location of the image in one list is used to locate the image in the other list, regardless of the key value specified. 若要设置项以大图标显示时要使用 (当属性设置为)，使用属性。To set the to use when displaying items with large icons (when the property is set to ), use the property. 如果你想要使用映像来显示项状态，请使用属性。If you want to use images to display item state, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个对象也会在代码示例中提供的映像对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性在创建控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例需要您添加到了代码和调用构造函数或在窗体上的另一种方法中的示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还需要映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常使用排序项属性，基于项文本的项进行排序。Typically items are sorted using the property, which sorts items based on the item text. 若要自定义排序顺序，必须编写一个实现类接口，并设置到该类的对象的属性。To customize the sort order, you must write a class that implements the interface and set the property to an object of that class. 这很有用，例如，如果想要对项的子项文本进行排序。This is useful, for example, when you want to sort items by subitem text. 执行手动排序的项的详细信息，请参阅示例属性。For more information on performing manual sorting of items, see the example for the property. 如果属性设置为值或者如果属性设置，则当项目添加对列表进行自动排序。If the property is set to a value other than or if the property is set, the list is sorted automatically when items are added. 标签文本发生更改时，项不会自动排序。Items are not sorted automatically when the label text changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以指定是否项中的排序控件。The property allows you to specify whether or not items are sorted in the control. 默认情况下，执行任何排序。By default, no sorting is performed. 当属性设置为或中的项升序字母顺序进行自动排序 (当属性设置为) 还是按降序字母顺序 (时属性设置为)。When the property is set to or , the items in the are sorted automatically in ascending alphabetical order (when the property is set to ) or descending alphabetical order (when the property is set to ). 可以使用此属性进行自动排序中显示的项在控制，以使用户更轻松地查找项目，大量的项不可用时。You can use this property to automatically sort items that are displayed in your control to make it easier for users to find items when a large number of items are available. 如果你想要执行项而不使用排序属性，请使用属性结合方法。If you want to perform your own item sorting instead of using the property, use the property in combination with the method. 如果属性设置为值或者如果属性设置，则对列表排序时自动添加项时。If the property is set to a value other than or if the property is set, the list is sorted automatically when items is added. 标签文本发生更改时，项不会自动排序。Items are not sorted automatically when the label text changes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个对象也会在代码示例中提供的映像对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性在创建控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例需要您添加到了代码和调用构造函数或在窗体上的另一种方法中的示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还需要映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 大小的磁贴时此属性控制属性设置为。This property controls the size of tiles when the property is set to . 设置此属性时很有用，为了防止子项文本太长，以显示单个行上时自动换行。Setting this property is useful to prevent line-wrapping when subitem text is too long to be displayed on a single line. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用平铺功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use the tiling feature. 在示例中，磁贴视图显示表示书籍的项。In the example, the tile view displays items that represent books. 每个项都显示为磁贴，其中包含的一本书、 标题、 作者和出版年份的图标。Each item is shown as a tile containing an icon of a book, the title, the author, and the publication year. 若要运行的示例代码，必须包括与该示例相同的目录中名为 Book.ico 的图标文件。For the example code to work, you must include an icon file named Book.ico in the same directory as the example. 若要查看不带图标视图中，注释掉的行与相关的磁贴对象。To see the tile view without icons, comment out the lines relating to the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 最初，具有零 (0) 的索引位置的项位于顶部控件。Initially, the item with the index position of zero (0) is at the top of the control. 如果控件内容滚动到，不同的项可以是在控件的顶部。If the control contents are scrolled, a different item can be at the top of the control. 可以使用此属性来指示或者确定哪一项是可见的顶部控件。You can use this property to indicate or determine which item is visible at the top of the control. 值属性不会始终保留，根据所需的顶级项在列表视图中的位置。The value of the property will not always persist, depending on where the desired top item is in the list view. 中可见的项的数目控件在任何时间取决于列表视图的高度和它包含的项的大小。The number of items visible in a control at any time depends on the height of the list view and the size of the items it contains. 如果项超过列表视图的高度，项将继续在多个页面，用户可以滚动浏览。If the items exceed the height of the list view, the items will continue onto multiple pages, which the user can scroll through. 如果您设置属性设置为的最后一页中的项，该项将自动滚动到视图; 但是，将设置为实际顶部的项的最后一页。If you set the property to an item in the last page of the , the item will automatically be scrolled into view; however, will be set to the actual top item of the last page. 若要确保特定的项在控件的可见区域 （但不是一定在顶部的位置），使用方法。To ensure that a specific item is in the visible region of the control (but not necessarily in the top position), use the method. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性没有时生效属性值是`false`。Setting this property has no effect when the property value is `false`. > > 不支持的版本中设置此属性[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]之前的版本 2.0。Setting this property is not supported in versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] prior to version 2.0. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重置的样式使用的对象的子项属性和方法。The following code example demonstrates resetting the style of a object's subitems through the use of the property and the method. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为的按钮的窗体`Button1`，并调用`InitializeListView`窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件处理程序。To run the example, paste the following code into a form containing a button named `Button1` and call the `InitializeListView` method in the form's constructor or event handler. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将更改为控件中[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]2.0 启用自定义状态图像以设置，以指示项是否选中或取消选中或处于不确定状态。Changes to the control in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 enable custom state images to be set to indicate whether an item is checked or unchecked or in an indeterminate state. 此功能，加[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]2.0 具有比.NET Framework 1.1 的不同行为。With the addition of this feature, the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 has different behavior than the .NET Framework 1.1. 如果已创建的应用程序依赖于中的行为[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]1.1 版中，确保属性设置为`true`，这是默认值。If you have created applications that depend on the behavior in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1, be sure that the property is set to `true`, which is the default value. 若要充分利用自定义状态图像，请设置到`false`。In order to fully take advantage of custom state images, set to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用的[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]设计器中，属性将设置为`false`。If you are using the [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] designer, the property will be set to `false`.
