remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您指定的显示类型控件用于显示项。The property allows you to specify the type of display the control uses to display items. 可以设置属性来显示每个项以大或小图标或显示垂直列表中的项。You can set the property to display each item with large or small icons or display items in a vertical list. 最丰富的选项是详细信息视图，它允许您查看不仅是项目，而每个项指定的任何子项。The richest option is the details view, which allows you to view not only the items but any subitems specified for each item. 每个项显示在网格中，使用垂直列出的各项和子项的项会显示在具有列标题的列。Each item is displayed in a grid, with each item listed vertically and the subitems for each item displayed in a column, with column headers. 详细信息视图是向用户显示数据库信息的绝佳方法。The details view is a perfect way to display database information to a user. Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003，还可以为通过显示大图标以及您选择的子项信息来平衡图形和文本信息的磁贴中显示的项。With Windows XP and Windows Server 2003, you can also display items as tiles that balance graphical and textual information by showing a large icon along with subitem information of your choosing. 若要启用磁贴视图，你的应用程序必须调用方法。To enable tile view, your application must call the method. 小图像视图右侧的图标显示图标和文本信息与每个项。The small-image view displays each item with an icon and textual information to the right of the icon. 大型图像视图显示的图标和图标下方的文本信息与每个项。The large-image view displays each item with an icon and textual information below the icon. 通过指定的图标的图像列表的大小的属性有关或属性。The size of the icons for the image list is specified by the property of the for the or properties. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用的小型和大型图标视图中，使用多个图像列表，控件，应放置小型和大型版本在同一图像的索引位置在其各自的图像列表中。If you are using multiple image lists, for small and large icon view, with a control, you should place small and large versions of the image at the same index location in their respective image lists. 视图之间切换时，一个列表中的图像的索引位置用于在其他列表中，而不考虑指定的密钥值找到该图像。When switching between views, the index location of the image in one list is used to locate the image in the other list, regardless of the key value specified. 中的属性的大多数的不同视图的行为或显示的方式，会影响控件。Most of the properties in the control affect how the different views behave or are displayed. 影响的项目的视图的某些属性才有用属性设置为特定值，而有些则是在所有视图很有用。Some properties that affect the views of the items are only useful when the property is set to a specific value, while others are useful in all views. 例如，属性，如并时才有用属性设置为，而和属性可在所有视图中。For example, properties such as and are only useful when the property is set to , while the and properties are useful in all views. 下表显示了一些成员以及它们是有效的中的视图。The following table shows some of the members and the views they are valid in. |ListView 成员ListView member|视图View| |---------------------|----------| | 属性 property| 或 or | | 属性 property| 或 or | | 方法 method|| ||之外的所有视图 All views except | | 属性 property| 或 or | | 事件 event|| | 方法 method|、 或 , , or | | 方法 method| 或 or | | 方法 method| 或 or | | 属性 property|之外的所有视图 All views except | | 属性 property|| | 属性 property|、 或 , , or | 可以使用属性，以便提供应用程序中数据的不同视图，或锁定特定视图，即可利用该视图的权益。You can use the property to provide different views of data in your application, or to lock a specific view to utilize that view's benefits. 例如，属性通常设置为因为详细信息视图提供了多种查看在其他视图中不可用的选项。For example, the property is often set to because the details view provides a number of viewing options not available in the other views. > [!NOTE] > 如果你控件没有指定任何列标题并设置属性设置为，则控件将不显示任何项。If your control does not have any column headers specified and you set the property to , the control will not display any items. 如果你控件没有指定任何列标题并设置属性设置为，则控件将不会显示任何子项。If your control does not have any column headers specified and you set the property to , the control will not display any subitems. 磁贴视图的左侧和文本的信息，在右侧显示大图标与每个项。The tile view displays each item with a large icon on the left and textual information on the right. 文本信息包含及后面的子项的项标签。The textual information consists of the item label followed by subitems. 默认情况下，将显示仅第一个子项，它对应于项的标签。By default, only the first subitem is displayed, which corresponds to the item label. 若要显示其他子项，必须添加对象添加到集合。To display additional subitems, you must add objects to the collection. 在磁贴中的每个子项对应于列标题。Each subitem in the tile corresponds to a column header. 若要控制显示哪些子项以及所显示的顺序，必须设置为每个项的属性和每个标头的属性。To control which subitems are displayed and the order in which they are displayed, you must set the property for each item and the property for each header. 然后可以添加、 删除和重新排列中的标头集合以实现所需的结果。You can then add, remove, and rearrange headers in the collection to achieve the desired result. 若要控制平铺视图中的磁贴的大小，设置属性。To control the size of the tiles in the tile view, set the property. 这很有用，为了防止子项文本的单个行太长时换行。This is useful to prevent line-wrapping when subitem text is too long for a single line. 磁贴视图的示例，请参阅属性。For an example of the tile view, see the property. > [!NOTE] > 虽然列仅显示在详细信息视图中，但没有列标题的子项不会显示在详细信息视图或磁贴视图中。Although columns are only displayed in the details view, subitems without column headers will not display in either the details view or the tile view. 当你的应用程序调用时，磁贴视图是仅适用于 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003方法。The tile view is available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the method. 在早期的操作系统上，任何与磁贴视图相关的代码都不起作用，且 控件将显示在大图标视图中。On earlier operating systems, any code related to the tile view has no effect, and the control displays in the large icon view. 因此，取决于磁贴视图的任何代码可能无法正常工作。As a result, any code that depends on the tile view might not work correctly. 可能想要编写代码来确定磁贴视图是否可用，并且不可用时提供备用的功能。You might want to include code that determines whether tile view is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable. 例如，当使用所有者描述的外观进行自定义磁贴视图中的项，可能想要在磁贴视图不支持的操作系统上运行时使用绘图代码适用于大图标视图。For example, when you use owner drawing to customize the appearance of items in the tile view, you might want to use drawing code appropriate to the large icon view when running on operating systems that do not support the tile view. 磁贴视图功能提供的同一个库提供操作系统主题功能。The tile view feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要检查此库的可用性，请调用方法重载，并传入值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个对象也会在代码示例中提供的映像对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性在创建控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例需要您添加到了代码和调用构造函数或在窗体上的另一种方法中的示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还需要映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未处于虚拟模式下，事件发生一次。If the is not in virtual mode, the event will occur. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性设置为`true`放入处于虚拟模式。Setting the property to `true` puts the into virtual mode. 在虚拟模式下，普通集合是未使用。In Virtual mode, the normal collection is unused. 相反，作为动态创建对象需要它们。Instead, objects are created dynamically as the requires them. 虚拟模式可以是很多情况下很有用。Virtual mode can be useful under many circumstances. 如果必须从已在内存中，非常大集合填充对象创建对象的每个条目可以是一种浪费。If a object must be populated from a very large collection already in memory, creating a object for each entry can be wasteful. 处于虚拟模式下，创建所需项。In virtual mode, only the items required are created. 在其他情况下，值的对象可能需要通常情况下，重新计算，对整个集合也这样做会产生不可接受的性能。In other cases, the values of the objects may need to be recalculated frequently, and doing this for the whole collection would produce unacceptable performance. 处于虚拟模式下，只有所需的项进行计算。In virtual mode, only the required items are calculated. 若要使用的虚拟模式，必须处理事件，每次都会引发需要项。In order to use virtual mode, you must handle the event, which is raised every time the requires an item. 此事件处理程序应创建所属的指定索引处的对象。This event handler should create the object that belongs at the specified index. 此外，属性必须设置为虚拟列表的大小。In addition, the property must be set to the size of the virtual list. 处理事件，搜索处于虚拟模式。Handling the event enables searching in virtual mode. 如果未处理此事件，并方法将返回`null`。If this event is not handled, the and methods will return `null`. 您可以处理事件，以维护的缓存对象。You can handle the event in order to maintain a cache of objects. 如果计算或查找来创建对象成本很高，维护缓存可以提高性能。If the calculation or lookup to create a object is expensive, maintaining a cache can improve performance. 如果属性设置为，则这将自动更改为时设置为`true`。If the property is set to , the value will automatically be changed to when is set to `true`. 处于虚拟模式下，收集已禁用。In virtual mode, the collection is disabled. 尝试访问它相对于。Attempting to access it results in an . 也是如此集合和集合。The same is true of the collection and the collection. 如果你想要检索选中项，使用和集合相反。If you want to retrieve the selected or checked items, use the and collections instead. ## Examples 此示例演示了一个简单其内容是第一次一万个平方值。This example illustrates a simple whose contents are the first ten thousand squares. 它处理搜索，并使用缓存来提高性能。It handles searching and uses a cache for increased performance.
